newsitem.title: UK: Willis Corroon in talks to sell WF Corroon.
newsitem.headline: Willis Corroon in talks to sell WF Corroon.

text.p: Insurance broker Willis Corroon Group Plc said on Wednesday it was in talks with privately-owned U.S. firm Buck Consultancy Inc on the sale of WF Corroon's operations in the U.S. and Britain.
WF Corroon is Willis Corroon's employee benefit consulting subsidiary. The unit's U.S. and UK operations had 1995 revenues of about 32 million stg or $50 million.
Buck Consultants is a New York-based actuarial and benefit consulting firm.

If the sale is agreed, Willis Corron will assist Buck's clients with insurance brokerage and risk mangement services, while Buck would provide the UK company's clients with its employee benefit consultancy services.
Further announcements will be made in due course, Willis Corroon said.
